channel.title: Dapr on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in Dapr on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 37 - 38, 2023
item.description:
This roundup covers last week and this week: Explore the Circuit Breaker Design Pattern with insights from Waldemar and learn how it handles errors in distributed systems. Discover the world of Distributed Computing with Simon’s exploration of Dapr’s sidecar pattern, simplifying infrastructure interactions.

Revolutionize SQL queries with Azure Open AI, delve into Langstream’s Gen AI framework, enhance Azure OpenAI models with vector search in Azure Cosmos DB, and master Apache Flink’s stream processing capabilities with Flink SQL.

Join me at Data Saturday Cape Town on September 30th for deeper insights.

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 36, 2023
item.description:
This week, discover event-driven systems with Dapr in Kubernetes, delve into AI compilers by Microsoft Research, and learn about OpenTelemetry for observability.

Uncover Formula 1 streaming data pipelines with Python, Kafka, RisingWave, and Confluent Cloud’s role in real-time insurance quotes.

Join me at Data Saturday Cape Town on September 30th, and save the date for AI & Data Infusion Roadshow Durban on November 11th.

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 13, 2021
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth that has to do with things that interest me:

  • AI/data science
  • data in general
  • data architecture
  • streaming
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog-post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me for the week just ending.
